thread.title: BRIEF-Melrose Says European Commission Gives Anti-Trust Clearance For GKN Deal

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Melrose Says European Commission Gives Anti-Trust Clearance For GKN Deal

organizations.name: european commission gives anti-trust clearance for gkn

text:
March 8 (Reuters) - MELROSE INDUSTRIES PLC:
* GM RESULTS AND EC CLEARANCE * MELROSE INDUSTRIES PLC - EUROPEAN COMMISSION PROVIDED CLEARANCE IN RESPECT OF EUROPEAN ANTI-TRUST FOR GKN DEAL
